attributes.action: Build an Ice Rink in Winchester or Eastleigh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eastleigh and Winchester both have plans to do some development. There have been plans to build another bowling ally which we really don't need. If an ice rink was built it could be used by the public all year round and it would also give the opportunity for an ice hockey team which i think would be very popular.

rejection.details: This is a local Government issue.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
